effect.@en: When these creatures are encountered, roll 1D6 Chaos Die. If the result is face ‘1-5’, their hunger has been sated. If the result is face ‘6’, their hunger has not yet been sated and they are in a state of frenzy. When sated, they add +1 to both Damage and Peril Condition Tracks. When in a state of frenzy, they add an additional 1D6 Fury Die to Damage.
